hadiths.text: Muhammad b. al-Munkadir said:I heard Jabir b. 'Abd Allah say: I presented bread and meat to the Prophet (ﷺ). He ate them and called for ablution water. he performed ablution and offered the noon (Dhuhr) prayer. He then called for the remaining food and ate it. He then got up and prayed and did not perform ablution

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي تَرْكِ الْوُضُوءِ مِمَّا مَسَّتِ النَّارُ
chapter.eng-name: Not Performing Wudu' FRom [Food Which Had Been Cooked] Over Fire
